author: nbubna
msg: VelocityViewServlet's doRequest() method will call requestCleanup(), we don't need to do it again here

author: nbubna
msg: we no longer use the encoding member, so drop that.

Continue to support the output.encoding property by concatenating it to the defaultContentType if a charset is not already specified therein and if the output.encoding property is not merely the default.

author: nbubna
msg: per bug 23621 (Matthew Payne) - use response.getWriter() instead of response.getOutputStream()
